name: Love Arrows
description:
Love Arrows: A transformation furry sex text game.

You just got a new job! Your job duties include transforming people into the perfect partners! 

This game contains M/M, M/F, and F/F sexual content. It's easy to avoid undesired pairings. The protagonist can be male or female.

This is Version 1.00 of Love Arrows. You can find more games on my Patreon, discord, and FurAffinity accounts with the specific links listed on the first page of the actual game. If you would like to support me, then become a patron at https://www.patreon.com/desirelines and you will receive access to early content and strategy guides for my games.
